data.name: Super Vili
data.detailed_description:
Help minister of health destroy deadly virus! Finish 21 levels in this 2D action platformer, collect stuff that fell from the truck, shoot masks on virus mutations or squish them all!

Controls:
MOVE - ARROWS or A and D keys
JUMP - SPACEBAR (KEY) or L1, L2, Y or B button
FIRE - LCTRL (KEY) or R1, R2, X or A button
RUN - HOLD FIRE ACTION
PAUSE GAME - ESC or P (KEY) or START button

Hints:
- masks are not 100% efficient
- use JUMP action on Game Over screen to fast RETRY

Super Vili on Croatian nationwide TV:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=JdsaIf7aSY8

Super Vili on Croatian nationwide newspapers and news portals:
https://www.24sata.hr/news/nas-super-vili-skuplja-wc-papir-puca-iz-maske-i-ide-na-sljeme-754006
https://m.vecernji.hr/kultura/super-vili-u-borbi-protiv-korone-gazi-viruse-i-skuplja-wc-papir-1480341
https://www.jutarnji.hr/life/zivotne-price/ministar-inspirirao-programerke-u-nasoj-videoigri-super-vili-maskama-rastjeruje-koronu-15060839

data.short_description: Help minister of health destroy deadly virus! Visit beautiful Croatia, try out jumping on the virus or shooting protective masks at it, find secret passages, try out the underwater level and more! Collect all the cool stuff you will need to give to your citizens during the lockout. Have fun!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Pentium Dual Core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL2 support
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows sound card compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Pentium Quad Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL2 support
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows sound card compatible

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: macOSX 10
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Sound Card: OpenGL2 support
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: macOSX 11
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: OpenGL2 support

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Ubuntu with Unity, Gnome, or KDE desktops
  • Processor: Pentium Dual Core
  • Graphics: OpenGL2 support
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Ubuntu with Unity, Gnome, or KDE desktops
  • Processor: Pentium Quad Core
  • Graphics: OpenGL2 support
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
